N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.5 - Fire prevention and safety practices and training

State Regulations
(a) The chief administrative officer of each
local correctional facility shall appoint one or more staff members to conduct
regular inspections of all areas of the facility to determine whether a fire
hazard exists and shall take the necessary action to remove such
hazard. (b) Such inspections shall
be conducted at weekly intervals or more frequently in the discretion of the
chief administrative officer, and the results of such inspections shall be
entered in a facility log maintained for this purpose. (c) Prior to assuming such duties, such
appointed staff members(s) shall have successfully completed a fire protection
seminar approved by the Office of Fire Prevention and Control. Notes
